name: Jalopy - The Road Trip Driving Indie Car Game (公路旅行驾驶游戏)
description: Build, repair, refuel and drive a dilapidated old car on a grand journey through the territories of the former Eastern bloc.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i3 2GHz or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1GB memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
